mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user A INNER JOIN owner B ON A.ID = B.ID WHERE (B.OWNERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{1},'%') OR A.PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{1},'%')) AND A.COMPANYID = #{0}

SELECT A.ID, A.`ENABLE`, A.PHONE, A.SERVICESTARTDATE, A.SERVICEENDDATE, A.CREATETIME, A.REMARK, B.OWNERNAME, B.IDTYPE, B.IDNUMBER FROM user A INNER JOIN owner B ON A.ID = B.ID WHERE (B.OWNERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{1},'%') OR A.PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{1},'%')) AND A.COMPANYID = #{0} LIMIT #{2},#{3}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO owner(ID, COMPANYID, OWNERNAME, IDTYPE, IDNUMBER) VALUES (#{id}, #{companyId}, #{ownerName}, #{idType}, #{idNumber})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM owner WHERE ID=#{0} LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT ID , COMPANYID , OWNERNAME , IDTYPE , IDNUMBER , EDITTIME FROM owner WHERE ID=#{0} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM vehicleinowner WHERE OWNERID=#{0} LIMIT 1

SELECT A.ID, B.DEVICENUMBER, C.PHONENUMBER, A.PLATENUMBER, A.PLATECOLOR, A.INSTALLDATE, A.ANNUALSURVEYDATE, A.REMARK, D.NAME AS MOTORCADE FROM vehicle AS A INNER JOIN device AS B ON A.DEVICEID=B.ID INNER JOIN simcard AS C ON B.SIMCARDID=C.ID INNER JOIN motorcade AS D ON A.MOTORCADEID=D.ID INNER JOIN vehicleinowner AS E ON A.ID=E.VEHICLEID WHERE E.OWNERID=#{0} ORDER BY A.PLATENUMBER
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM vehicleinowner WHERE OWNERID=#{0} AND VEHICLEID=#{1} LIMIT 1
